channel.title: The Grand Dark Conspiracy
channel.description: The is YOUR paranormal podcast, covering all things supernatural and unexplained. You suggest the guest, you submit the question and you provide the ghost stories. I will interview experts, at your suggestion, in the paranormal field and ask them your questions. Also I will take the ghost stories posted on our forum and create an Old Time Radio play called "Campfire Tales". Welcome to the Grand Dark Conspiracy, you are now a conspirator.
channel.itunes:subtitle: YOUR Paranormal Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: A paranormal podcast with content driven by the listener, from guests and the questions they are asked to the listeners' ghost stories.
channel.itunes:author: Daniel Bautz
channel.itunes:keywords: Ghosts, Vampires, Paranormal, Supernatural, Haunting, Possession, Exorcism, Ghost Stories, Poltergeist, Ghost Hunters, Parapsychology, Voodoo, Psychic, spirituality, ufo, alien, abduction
